p: The analysis was performed according to ANPA [ 31]. Compost C, N and S content were measured using a CNS automatic analyzer (Elementar vario MACRO CNS, Elementar Analysen systeme GmbH, Hanau, Germany). Organic-N was calculated by subtracting NH + 4 (determined by the selective electrode, Sevenmulti Mettler Toledo) from total Kjeldahl N [ 32].
